column5: Julie, I'm saddened for you and your family, at the loss of your cousin and friend. Always take time to remember the good times, and she'll aways be with you  God speed.  John
Well that's just terrible news, very sorry for your loss.  My condolences to you and your family.  Fishnsled
So sorry to hear about your loss. It is very difficult to go through and time does make it better. We've all been there at one time.  Our prayers are there for you.
Sad news indeed, sorry for your loss and my condolances to you and your family.
So sorry for your loss. I hope you have great memories of time spent with her.  Sincerely, 1leg

Julie.. so sorry to hear of your loss... Condolences  from my family to yours.. Remember all the good times you have had and cherish them.. Time will heal all sorrow as they say.. Take care we are all here if you need us
Thank you very much Lonnietoon!
Sorry to hear about your loss fishergirl.  My condolances to you and your family.  Mike

Thank you smokey! And Jen, thank you for you very kind words. And Bly, Thank you so much for calling me this afternoon, it was good to have someone to talk to and knew what I was talking about and helping me understand why she suffered like she did, you were great to talk to, it was a real comfort, and you are a good friend, I might just take you up on that offer on going out for a coffee.

I'm not much of a condolence person, Julie. It's life...it's how it works. It is a strange situation that the more family and friends you have, the more likely you are to be 'hurt' more often. It's also strange that should you have but very little family and friends, a loss will (should) hurt you more.  Everyone has conveyed the important message....be strong and remember the good times. Remember also that wherever she is, she will remember you as a person who cared.  Be well....
Anytime Julie
Sorry to hear about your loss. It's hard, made even tougher for you because you don't have any answers as to why. Be strong for your family during this difficult time.
Sorry for your loss fishergirl hope her memory will live on with you and yours
Sorry to hear about the loss of a loved one. It's always tough.  Take care.. Craig

It is so strange that I just made a post on who you would love to spend 2 days with and my mom called tonight with the sad news that my cousin just passed away this evening. We have no clue on how she passed away which is the fustrating part of the whole situation. A family member thought it was weird that they did not hear from her as she called everyday,(she was always quite lonely) and she went to check on her and she found my cousin semi concesious barely breathing so she was rushed to the hospital and just when the paramedics got her to the hospital, she stopped breathing and they revived her but she passed away very shortly. The family is requesting an autopsy which will be done tomorrow. We are thinking that since she had so many problems and was on so many meds, that somehow she got confused somewhere along the lines and possibly overdosed by accident but we will not no for sure until the autopsy is complete. She had a very hard life but was a good and kind woman and I am just glad that last summer and the last holiday that we were there I often vistited her, to sit and chat and have coffee. She always loved company. When this happens it often makes you realize and think that anyone can go at any time and it is so important to always be kind to your loved ones and to let them know that you love them and they are important to you because you will never know when they can be taken away from you at any given day or moment and you don't want them to leave this world thinking or feeling differently on how you felt or how you thought of them . I really don't have any friends but I know that I have some friends here, that is why I came here for comfort. I am going to miss her.
Sorry to hear Julie! Lots of support here for sure and I'm sure that lad you live with will be there for you the most.
Sorry for your loss fishergirl. I hope you have many fond remembrances.
Oh man...Julie...we are so sorry to hear this sad news.  If you need anything...watch Angelina.....talk....whatever, just let us know...you have our number.  Cliff and Carole
Yes, sorry to hear of your loss.. I was just gonna reply in the other thread ...

Sorry to hear that Julie, and yes, even though most of us do not know you, you indeed have friends here, thats the best thing about this place, the support group in tough times like this. I personally think this place is a better support group than any professional services.  My condolences to you and yours.
That's terrible Julie.  My condolances to you and your family at this sad time.  Joey
That is sad news Julie. So sorry to hear that.  Remember the time you spent with her.
Thats too bad... Sorry for your loss.

With words you can't feel the hugs that you would if we could all reach out ... so saying I am so sorry for your loss and that of your family will have to due... Times like this make you realize just how much life means!
Very sad for you and your family ..I am sorry for your loss.
Sorry to hear of your loss Julie. Please accept our condolences.
Oh Julie i am so so sorry hun.  My condolances to you and your family also. If you need to talk you know where i am okay grl?  Luv N hugs  Nauti

That's too bad to hear.  Two summer's ago, my cousin was killed in an ATV accident, he was only 22 years old!  He got me started on fishing when I was about 4 and everything I now know, I owe to him.  I'll miss him, as you will miss your cousin and as she would say, miss me but let me go.

I am so sorry to hear of your loss. The death of someone close to us is one of life's most stressful events. It takes time to heal and each of us responds differently but you can be sure that we will help in any way we can!

The other thread you were referring to is a great thread and I'm sure it's bringing back a lot of memories for those who have read and posted there. It did for me.  Allow me to extend my condolences for your loss.  The sudden-unexpected ones are the hardest.  We all feel your loss and we're with you, even in our thoughts and prayers !!!
SORRY TO HEAR FISHERGIRL!! MY FAMILY SENDS THERE LOVE AND PRAYERS!!
Sorry to hear it, you just never know what will happen.
So sorry for your loss.....
sorry for your loss!
Very sad when people go before there time, I'm glad you got to spend some good time with her that you will remember.
Sorry to here of your loss, our prayers are with you.
Truly sorry to hear this My family and I will be thinking of you  Peter
My condolances to you and your family

I want to thank everyone here for their support through this hard time for me, and I knew I came to the right place to have friends to lean on. There has been no word yet on her autopsy results, but when I find out, I will keep you all updated. Thank you again so much for your friendship.
